attributes.action: Stephen Sutton to receive posthumous OBE
attributes.additional_details: Stephen Sutton was diagnosed with cancer at the age of 15, and subsequently went through aggressive  treatments. He was well known for his blog Stephen's Story and his fundraising efforts for the Teenage Cancer Trust charity for the aid of teenagers with cancer. His Dignified and brave battle with cancer have touched many across the nation and he has been a inspiration to many people. I believe for his services to charity, evident by the amazing fundraising which has been well published. Sould allow Stephen to be nominated to receive a OBE posthumously.
